title: 217: SHOCKED by the Long Island Medium!
itunes:title: 217: SHOCKED by the Long Island Medium!
description:
(TW: murder/suicide case discussed 00:15:30 - 00:18:00) The Broads are joined by the iconic Long Island Medium, Theresa Caputo! They discuss when she first discovered her gift, what it is like for her kids, some of her most impactful sessions, when and from whom she receives messages, being a medium in quarantine, Theresa receives messages for Bekah and Jess from past loved ones that rock them, and much more! 


THERESA CAPUTO:

Find out more at: https://www.theresacaputo.com/

Listen to her podast “Hey Spirit!”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/hey-spirit-with-theresa-caputo/id1534764208

Follow her at: https://www.instagram.com/theresacaputo/

***Download Discovery + to watch all past seasons of “The Long Island Medium” and her latest series! 


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***ARTICLE: Get $50 OFF YOUR FIRST PURCHASE OF ONE HUNDRED DOLLARS OR MORE at article.com/chatty

***KIWI CO: Get 30% off your first month plus FREE shipping on ANY crate line with code CHATTY at kiwico.com 

***DAILY HARVEST: Go to dailyharvest.com and enter promo code CHATTY to get $25 off your first box!

***HIGHKEY: Get 15% of your order at highkey.com/CHATTY
